trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue if the current process should resume when the event handler concludes; false if the current process should terminate.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: The default value is false; the current process terminates when the event handler returns.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the combination of modifier and console keys that interrupted the current process.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies the key combination that interrupted the current process.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.
